<file path="source.go">
package worker

import (
    "context"
    "sync"
)

type Job struct {
    ID int
}

type Worker struct {}

type Dispatcher struct {
    JobChannel chan Job
}

func NewDispatcher(maxWorkers int) *Dispatcher
    return &Dispatcher{
    		JobChannel: make(chan Job, 100),
    		maxWorkers: maxWorkers,
    	}
func (d *Dispatcher) Run(ctx context.Context)
    var wg sync.WaitGroup
    for loop:
    wg.Add(1)
        worker := Worker{...}
        go worker.start(ctx)
    wg.Wait()
</file>
